dialogues.text: Achcha hua, aap hee ne saanp boya tha, aap hee ko das liya.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (angry) Arre bhaiya isko waise samjhaao na jaise isse samajh mein aata hai. Vidrohi stops and looks worried. Chirag stops Munna and then turns to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Dekh Vidrohi, woh ladki tujh se milna chahti hai. Tu uss se ek baar mil le, uska dil tod de, main apna jod loonga. Phir tu apne raste, main apne raste.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Burna mat maanna bhaiya, paanch saal mein mere saath jo kuch hua uss se aapko kuch farak pada??? Ab aapka dil toote ya phoote uss se mujhe kya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (stern) Abbe sunn, agar mera dil toota toh teri maa ka dil bhi toot jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (Worried) Kyon?  74.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab jab usko maaloom padega ki uska shravan kumaar bhabhiji bhabhiji bol ke, apne badan pe sari lapet ke janaaniyon ko bechta hai toh uska dil toh toot jaayega na. Kyon munna?

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Phoot phoot ke royengi bechaari.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (scandalized) Ye toh sarasar black mail hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (smiling) Abhi samjha tu. Vidrohi is stunned. He turns to the boy in the shop.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (almost crying) Beta Banarasi mein bhi dikha de idhar.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 137 EXT. DHABA —- NIGHT 137 Chirag, Munna and Vidrohi are having dinner.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Humko kya karna padega?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bitti ko rangbaaz, gunde type ke ladkon se sakth nafrat hai.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre woh nafrat ke laayak hee hote hain bhaiya (looks at Munna) raub jhaadte hain khaali.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tu bhi rangbaaz banega.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Ye?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hum se nahi hoga bhaiya.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Iss se nahi hoga bhaiya.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Hum hain na sikhaane ke liye.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre aise hee le chalo na bhaiya, aise hee hum kisi ko pasand nahi aate. Unko bhi nahi aayenge. Kasam se.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Main koi risk nahi lena chahta. Vidrohi makes a helpless face.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. MEN’S CLOTH (BIG BAZAAR) SHOWROOM - DAY 138 Chirag and Munna are sitting. Vidrohi comes out wearing a tight jeans and a black shirt. Chirag and Munna get up and look at him. Vidrohi has fully buttoned up the shirt. Chirag opens the top three buttons and pulls the shirt back with the collar, over Vidrohi’s shoulders. Vidrohi pulls the shirt back to it’s normal position.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bhaiya button toh badan chhupaane ke liye hote hain na? Chirag pulls the shirt back with the collar again.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abbe tashan dikhaane ke liye bhi hote hain. Quick cuts of a belt with metallic spikes going inside jeans, a lose bracelet being worn, pump shoes getting zipped.  139 140 76. Vidrohi is looking at his reflection in the mirror, looking meek.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pait andar aur seena baahar. Vidrohi tries is but looks awkward. Munna demonstrates. Vidrohi trying to walk in high heel pump shoes, failing. Chirag and Munna show him the posture.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. MALL — DAY 139 Three of them are going in an escalator. Vidrohi has lost his posture.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Akad ke khade reh... akad ke. Vidrohi changes his posture. Top shot. All three are going up the escalator like a rangbaz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag, Vidrohi and Munna are sitting on the three sides of the table. Chirag dials a number on his mobile. Vidrohi picks up his mobile, turns away a bit as he covers the mobile with other hand.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (politely) Haan ji bhaiya boliye.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aise baat karega?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bhaiya kaun saab bol rahe hain?  141 142 143 77. Chirag gives him a tapli.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aise baat karega?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Toh kaise karoon?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Mujhe phone laga. Vidrohi calls. Chirag’s mobile rings. He picks up his mobile with his left hand, stretches his hand fully in air and gives it a gentle jerk, then he slowly takes the mobile close to his ear, keeping it slightly away from the ear, waits for a while before he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Haan bol. Then he looks at Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aise bolte hain.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aap bol rahe ho... toh bolte honge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All three on the bike. Chirag giving a tapli to vidhrohi who is riding too slow. He speeds up.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. VIDROHI’S HOUSE LUCKNOW - NIGHT 142 Vidrohi practicing all this in front of a mirror in his house. The pulling back of the shirt, picking up the mobile, stomach in, chest out etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are sitting on a park bench.  78.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aur koi tujhe bulaayega toh kaise dekhega?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bula ke dekh leejiye.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Vidrohi!!! Vidrohi turns towards him in slow motion. Chirag and Munna look impressed.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Waah bettaaa!

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (in style) Thoda bahut toh hum bhi jaante hain bey. Munna shows him a punch.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Achcha, bataayein.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Nahi bhaiya... joking only.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag, Munna and Vidrohi are standing by a tree. Vidrohi is sitting on a bike.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ye lalla tumhaari antim pareeksha hai. Beech sadak pe bike park kar, paan bandhwa, chaba aur nikal.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bhaiya je Lucknow hai, yahaan baat baat pe goli maar dete hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Nikal.  145 79. Vidrohi hesitantly sits on the bike and goes a bit ahead, looks around and stops in the middle of the road. Chirag and Munna are watching.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Kya lagta hai bhaiya, kar paayega?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Dekho. Vidrohi moves towards the paan shop and orders a paan.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (style) Ek banarsi geela sookha. Just then an open jeep with two men comes and stops near the bike.

dialogues.speaker: MAN 1
dialogues.text: Abbe kiski bike hai bey ye? Vidrohi hears the honk and shouting coming from behind and takes the paan, looking a bit nervous. Chirag and Munna watch. When Vidrohi turns, he is no longer nervous. He walks towards the bike, putting paan in his mouth and rubbing his fingers on his hair, staring at the men who are honking and screaming. Then men stop honking. Vidrohi sits on the bike, still staring at the men, starts it and moves on. Chirag and Munna are very impressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag, Munna and Vidrohi are at the platform, waiting for the train. It’s late night and not many people are there. Vidrohi is practicing his walk and gestures.  80.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Mubarak ho bhaiya, kenchue ko phan nikaalna sikha diya aapne toh. Chirag is dialing a number with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 146 INT. BITTI’S OFFICE - DAY 146 Bitti’s landline rings. She picks it up mechanically.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Poore shahar ki gayi hai. Thodi der mein aa jaayegi. Asuvidha ke liye khed hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre madam hum bol rahe hain. Mobile phir chori ho gaya kya?

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 148 INT. BITTI’S OFFICE - CONTINUOUS 148 Bitti smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Arre uski charging khatam ho gayi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Chaliye aapko charge kar dete hain. Aapke Vidrohi ji mil gaye hain.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: (Excited) Kaise hain?  150 81. Chirag looks at Vidrohi checking his own antics in front of the window of AC compartment and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Khud hee dekh leejiyega. Saath mein la rahe hain. Bitti keeps the phone. She has a smile on her face. Chirag is looking at Vidrohi. He has a smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag, Munna and Vidrohi walk out of the station holding their bags. Vidrohi walks in his Rangbaaz character. The Ticket checker asks for the ticket at the gate.

dialogues.speaker: TICKET CHECKER
dialogues.text: Ticket.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (STYLE) Kahan ka kaatein? Hospital ka ki shamshaan ka?

dialogues.speaker: TICKET CHECKER
dialogues.text: (Scared) Jaaiye Bhaisaab. Munna then asks Vidrohi the reason why he didn’t show the ticket.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Abe ticket tha toh dikhaya kyun nahi?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (normal) Bhaiya rangbaaz log nahi dikhaate hain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 151 INT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE —- EVENING 151 Bitti is getting ready and Rama is furious. We see a lot of clothes on hangers. May be an assistant is standing there holding a few dresses as well.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Arre itne kapde toh heroine gaane mein change nahi karti jitne toone jaane mein change kar rahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tu chup reh. Bitti’s phone rings, she picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bolo.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Kahan pahunchi?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Bas nikal rahe hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Kamaal karti ho yaar... arre akdu type ka aadmi hai, badi mushkil se mana ke laaye hain. Uth ke chale gaye to hum bhi nahi rok paayenge.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tumne chaar din laga diye Vidrohi jee ko laane mein. Main do ghante toh laga hee sakti hoon sajne mein... rok ke rakho unko, aa rahi hun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vidrohi looks nervous as he bites his nails.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bas aa rahi hai.  VID. Hum... hum t. na? CHI. Haan... bas yaad rakhna. VID. Sab... sab y Vidrohi bites more na 83.

dialogues.speaker: ROHI
dialogues.text: heek lag rahe hain

dialogues.speaker: RAG
dialogues.text: jitna bataya hai...

dialogues.speaker: ROHI
dialogues.text: aad hai bhaiya. ils.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Naam... naam kya bataya tha? Chirag gives him a dirty look.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Haan... haan. Bitti... Bitti. Chirag looks exasperated.

dialogues.text: Abbe mand buddhi, tum sab gud gobar mat ka VID. Hum sambhaal aap... aap n Vidrohi takes out his forehead. 153 EXT. AC RESTAURANT -— Munna is standing beh and Rama reach the re out his mobile. r dena.

dialogues.text: lenge bhaiya... ervous mat ho. kerchief and wipes his

dialogues.text: 154 155 156 84. INT. AC RESTAURANT —- EVENING 154 Rama and Bitti enter the restaurant, Chirag whispers to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aa gayi... Vidrohi takes a deep breath and then turns his head slowly towards them with attitude and looks back at Chirag. Bitti and Rama have wide smiles on their faces. Chirag starts the introduction.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji, ye hain... Before Chirag could complete, Vidrohi’s phone rings. Vidrohi gestures Chirag to stop and picks up the phone in the same Rangbaaz style.
