dialogues.text: EXT. AC RESTAURANT —- CONTINUOUS 155

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Munna bol raha hun... aur ab jo bhi boloonga... wo repeat karna.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. AC RESTAURANT — CONTINUOUS 156 Vidrohi gestures Bitti and Rama to sit as he continues talking over the phone. Rama and Bitti sit, still looking excited.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: To main kya karun be?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: To main kya karun be? Bitti’s smile disappears.  85.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Bolo usko, Vidrohi ji ka kaam hai, aur na maane toh dhar ke do kantaap dena kaan ke neeche.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bolo usko, Vidrohi ji ka kaam hai, aur na maane toh dhar ke do kantaap dena kaan ke neeche. Bitti looks at Chirag in disbelief. Chirag shrugs his shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur suno, aisi aundi pondi baaton ke liye phone na kiya karo. Vidrohi hangs up the phone and apologizes in rangbaaz style.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry...

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: It’s ok.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aap mein se Guddi kaun hai?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Guddi nahi, Bitti... main hun.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Haan... haan. Bitti Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Aur main Rama... iski best friend. Vidrohi looks at Rama a tad longer and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hellllo!

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Aapne pehchana nahi? Maine toh photo bhi bheji thi aapko.  86.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Photo... haan, sab bhejte hain photo toh... Looks at Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bata na yaar Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Haan... sab bhejte hain photo. Bitti looks disappointed. Vidrohi looks at the waiter and calls him.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aye beta... idhar aao. Waiter comes at the table

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya lijiyega? Waiter is confused.

dialogues.speaker: WAITER
dialogues.text: Sorry sir?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Kaun poochega?

dialogues.speaker: WAITER
dialogues.text: Sorry sir... Kya lijiyega?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ek kaam kar chaar chai le aa. Waiter leaves, a very disappointed Bitti looks at Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Nahi nahi chai nahi... hum log ab niklenge.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (teasing) Kyun? Abhi toh aaye hain...

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Rama ke bhai ko aankh aa gayi hai doctor ko dikhaana hai.  87. Rama looks at Bitti in surprise. Bitti makes her eyes wide as she looks at Rama.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Aankh aa gayi hai?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Haan aa gayi hai. Chirag has a smirk on his face.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre toh kal Vidrohi ji ko khane pe bula lo... Sunday hai... uncle aunty se bhi mil lenge. Vidrohi looks nervous and Bitti looks disinterested.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Haan... Mil lenge usmein kya hai. Bitti shakes hands with Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Nice meeting you.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Very Nice. Rama shakes hands with Vidrohi with a huge smile on her face.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Bohot achha likhte hain aap.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bohot achha dikhti hain aap. Rama blushes and they leave. Vidrohi watches them go in Rangbaaz style. The moment the step out Vidrohi pulls his shirt to normal.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Theek kiye na bhaiya hum?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Baaja phaad diye bey tum toh. Chirag pulls his cheeks and hugs Vidrohi with a huge smile on his face.  157 88. He then sees Bitti and Rama coming back hurriedly. Chirag while still hugging Vidrohi, pulls his collar to the rangbaaz style and whispers.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wapas aa gayi... Vidrohi then gets back in the rangbaaz character and strongly pats on Chirag’s back.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Chal beta... milte hain phir haan. Vidrohi then looks at Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arre aap... wapas... mann nahi kiya kya jaane ka? Ha ha ha ha Bitti points towards her purse hanging on the chair.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Nahi woh, purse chhoot gaya tha.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aaiye aapko bahar tak chhod ke aate hain. Bitti walks away. Cut to Chirag smiling

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. CHIRAG’S HOUSE - NIGHT 157 Munna is talking to Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (beaming) Kal Vidrohi ko Bitti ke mummy papa se milwa raha hoon.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Arre bhaiya, jab bhabhi ke sar se Vidrohi ka bukhaar utar hi gaya hai... to kaadha kaahe pila rahe ho?  89.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Munna antibiotic ka course 3 din ka hota hai... fayda pehle hi din nazar aane lagta hai... lekin agar course complete nahi kiya toh beemaari wapas aane ka khatra bana rehta hai.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Matlab baaki ke do dose Bitti ke Mummy Papa hain? Chirag gives a wicked smile to Munna.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 158 EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE - NIGHT 158 Bitti looks disappointed as she talks to Rama.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kitna akdu tha yaar...Mann Toh kiya khench ke ek kantaap maar dun. (Irritated) Aap logon mein se Guddi kaun hai? Huh.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Itna bura bhi nahi tha... arre kamyaab aadmi thoda akdu hota hai... kabhi bhikhari ko dekha hai akadte huye (imitates akdu bhikhari) Aye maayi, Allah ke naam pe kuch dena hai to de... warna nikal idhar se. Aisa dekha hai kabhi.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kal ghar pe bhi tapak rahe hain sahab. Rama excitedly says.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Main bhi aa rahi hun.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tu bada liliya rahi hai.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Haan toh? Mujhe toh achha laga.  159 160 90.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Main bol rahi hun abhi se...kal zyada hero bane na...

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: ...toh chipka dena kaan ke neeche bas. Aane toh de yaar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag, Munna and Vidrohi are going on Chirag’s bike with Vidrohi sandwiched between them. Vidrohi is carrying a plastic carry bag as well.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Ye sari kaahe le ke aaya be?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (normal) Ladki ke ghar khaali haath nahi jaate hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abbe ladki dekhne nahi ja rahe ho tum.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Sorry bhaiya, aap hee de deejiyega.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tu laaya hai, tu hee de. Aur saath mein pehen ke dikha bhi dena. (Imitating Vidrohi) Ye dekhiye bhabhi ji... teen color ki fading hai front mein. Chirag and Munna burst out laughing. Vidrohi keeps a straight face.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - DAY 160 Bitti is anxious and doesn’t look happy. She sees her father wearing monkey cap.  161 gl.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Ye mat pehna karo aap. Ekdum gande dikhte ho.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Beta iss umar mein dikne se zyada tikne ki fikar rehti hai. Kahin hum nipat liye toh...

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: (cuts him) Achcha theek hai pehne raho (turns to her mother) aur itna halwa poori mat banao, koi ladka nahi aa raha dekhne.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre hamari aisi kismat kahan ki tumhe koi dekh ke pasand kar jaaye.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Ummeed bhi mat rakhna, yahin baithenge tumhaari khopadi pe zindagibhar. There’s a knock on the door.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Jaa khol jaldi, Chirag hoga.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI’S HOUSE - DAY 161 Bitti’s father opens the door. Vidrohi touches the father’s knee in style.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Paranam uncle Father smiles and greets him, then realizes that he doesn’t know Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Paranam beta paranam... tum kaun? Vidrohi enters the house without permission.  92.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre andar aaiye, baith ke baat karte hain... sharmaiye mat. Father is confused.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arre bhai hum kyun sharmaayenge (mumbles ) Chirag enters.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Namaste uncle.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Chirag beta namaste... ye kaun hai? Just then Vidrohi and Bitti exchange a look. Bitti gives a fake smile. Rama and Vidrohi exchange a smile.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Ye Vidrohi ji hain, kal bataya tha na inke baare mein. Bitti’s mother also comes out as Rama and Bitti sit.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Accha to aap hi hain jisnhone wo adbhut kitaab likhi hai? Vidrohi smiles and hands over the sari to the mother.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ummeed hai ki aapko pasand aayi hogi. Mother looks at the sari and gets excited.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Chanderi!!! Vidrohi looks back at her in style. Bitti looks at her mother in disbelief. Rama smiles.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Happy Birthday, jab bhi ho.  93.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beta chaas, lassi, sharbat, kya loge?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Chai lenge aunty, kadak? Mother looks at Chirag who is not getting any attention.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tum to sharbat hi loge. Mother leaves, Chirag looks uncomfortable. Father is having difficulty in turning his neck. He uncomfortably turns towards Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Aur beta dil behlaane ke liye likhte ho ya paise kamane ke liye?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Laxmi Ji ki kripa se paise toh itne hain uncle ki aapki dukaan khareed ke aap hi ko gift kar dein... dhan teras pe. Saraswati ji likhwati hain toh likh lete hain. Vidrohi gives a glance towards Rama. Rama looks at Bitti and shows her appreciation. Chirag notices the discomfort on Father’s face and tries to change the topic.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Gardan mein kuch takleef hai kya uncle?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Puraani gaadi hai beta, koi na koi kaam marammat ka nikal hi aata hai. Mother screams from inside.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Gaye hafte toh bavaseer theek hui inki.  94. Father looks uncomfortable with his neck.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Doodh mein tukmalanga daal ke raat mein khaaiyega, bahut aaram milega. Vidrohi gets up and walks towards the Father.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre malanga falanga chhodiye, laaiye hum tuning kar dete hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Rehne deejiye, tuning ke chakkar mein kahin engine na baith jaaye.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Kuch nahi hoga (turns to father) seedhe baithiye. Vidrohi then artistically does some hand gestures, holds the father’s neck and cracks it both ways. Father looks relieved instantly. he gets up and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arre wah! Sandaas se le ke chauke tak, sab ekdum bina ghoome dikh raha hai. Bitti and Rama both are impressed.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Ye kaam kab shuru kiya aapne?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bas abhi abhi, aapke pitaji pehle customer hain. Bitti smiles. Chirag is not liking all this. He is whispering on his phone, walking towards a corner.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Laga na phone. Mother walks in with a cup of tea.  95.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aur beta shaadi ho gayi? Bitti rolls her eyes. Vidrohi’s phone rings. He gestures mother to wait and takes the call as he looks at Rama.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 162 EXT. TEA STALL — CONTINUOUS 162

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Sun bey...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 163 INT. BITTI’S COURTYARD — CONTINUOUS 163

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Tu sun bey... aage se phone kiya na to aisi laat maarenge ki koolha barbaad ho jaayega...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 164 EXT. TEA STALL — CONTINUOUS 164 Munna looks at his phone, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 165 INT. BITTI’S COURTYARD — CONTINUOUS 165

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Phone rakh. Vidrohi cuts the phone looking at Rama. Chirag can’t believe it. Mother shakes with the tray.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kadak... Vidrohi looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Chai... kadak hai beta.  166 167 96. Vidrohi smiles and takes the cup. Chirag feels a bit left out as everyone is paying attention to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Achcha aunty ab hum chalte hain.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (To Chirag) Theek hai beta jaao (turns to Vidrohi) Tumhe bina khaaye nahi jaane denge. Chirag makes a face.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - DAY 166 They are having lunch. Vidrohi is getting attention by mother and Rama. Chirag is sitting and watching quietly, sulking and eating. Rama forcibly keeps a barfi in Vidrohi’s plate.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre barfi toh lo beta, bahut famous hai hamaare yahaan ki.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Jaante hain aunty. Bitti smiles as Vidrohi looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. ISOLATED PLACE
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is sitting nervously watching Chirag pace up and down. He looks to his right and sees Munna eating banana and staring back at him. Munna then turns to Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Hum toh pehle hee bole the ki bhej do iss appendix ko waapas. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap hee ko antibiotic ka course poora karna tha. Ho gaya na overdose. Chirag goes to slap Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bahut shaktimaan bann rahe the... Vidrohi takes an evasive action.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre hum toh wahi kiye jo aap log sikhaaye rahe. Phir hum galat kaise ho gaye?

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Phone pe kya bak raha tha bey? Laat maar ke koolha bigaadega mera?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre bhaiya hum character mein ghus chuke hain. Baar baar script change karenge toh performance looj ho jaayega na.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kya jaroorat thi uski baap ki gardan mein ghusne ki?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre ek bujurg aadmi pain mein the, hum relief de diye. Hain toh aapke sasur hee na. Aur aapki help nahi kar rahe hain? Chirag looks around in frustration then turns back to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Depress karne bheje the, tum impress kar ke aa gaye.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Theek hai bhaiya, phir hum waapas chale jaate hain.  168 169 98.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Pehle jo gobar kiye ho uske upley bana ke jaao. Vidrohi looks helpless.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. VIDROHI’S HOUSE - NIGHT 168 Vidrohi is finishing his dinner. He looks a bit emotional. His mother asks him for one more chapati.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Le ek aur le le.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bas ho gaya amma (mumbles) subah se kha hee rahe hain. He gets up and washes his hands.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Theek se khaaya karo tum. Sookh ke titahdi ho gaye ho. Aise shareer pe sherwani achchi lagegi?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre hum hee mein hain sab khaamiyaan. Chhod do humko akela. He walks out. Mother screams from behind.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aur waapas kab ja rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: EXT. MARKET PLACE
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is walking in his t shirt and pyjama. His shoulders are dropped. Bitti is standing at a pan shop. She notices Vidrohi walking past.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji.  99. Vidrohi, still emotional, turns back and looks surprised on seeing Bitti. He immediately gets back into character.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bitti ji, aap yahaan, itni raat ko?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Papa khaane ke baad pan na khaayein toh bade kadve ho jaate hain. Vidrohi smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aap yahaan kaise?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hum khaane ke baad meetha na khaayein toh bade pheeke ho jaate hain. Bitti taunts with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Meetha thoda zyada khaya kijiye, kadwahat kam hogi aapki. Vidrohi’s smile disappears.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hum itne kadve hain?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Nahi, par waise nahi hain jaisa humne socha tha... matlab maine aur Rama ne.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Kya socha tha aapne... aur Rama ne?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Nahi... letters aapke saare sringaar ras ke the, nikle aap veer ras ke.  170 100. Vidrohi puts his head down and looks emotional. Bitti looks at him and tries to correct herself.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Galat mat samajiyega. Aise bhi bure nahi hain aap. Vidrohi is getting more emotional.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bure toh Bitti ji haalaat hote hain, log hote hain. Hum itne kadve nahi the... Bitti ji. Haalat aur logon ne hame kadva bana diya hai. Aur kadve insaano mein bhi dil hota hai Bitti ji, jo kadva nahi hota. Vidrohi is teary eyed. Bitti is surprised.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji... aap theek toh hain? She holds his hands. Vidrohi looks at her teary eyed. Then he turns to the sweet shop guy.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (emotionally) Ek malai maalpua (pauses) do kar de.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. /EXT. RAMA’S BOUTIQUE 170 Rama and Bitti are drinking whiskey in khulhad. Rama is laughing.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Malai malpua (laughs uncontrollably)

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Yaar Vidrohi ji waise nahi hain jaisa main soch rahi thi.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: (little drunk) Tu kaisa soch rahi thi?  101.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Arre...Dil ke bahut achche aadmi hain woh.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Tu bol rahi hai? Tera pyaar bol raha hai, ya whiskey? (Teases and giggles)

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tujhe chadh gayi hai chudail. Rama checks if her mouth is stinking of alcohol.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Papa ko pata pada na toh utaar denge. Bitti gives her some garlic.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tension mat le. Ye le.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Lehsun?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Lehsun nahi, license hai, sharab peene ka. Do chaba le, kisi ko pata bhi nahi padega gaumootra piya ya somras. (Holding garlic) Isse na ladkiyaan sanskaari bani rehti hain. Bitti looks a little drunk as she laughs.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 171 EXT. DAM —- AFTERNOON 171 Chirag and Bitti are sitting and eating Peanuts

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tumne bataaya nahi kaise lage Vidrohi ji?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tumne poochcha hee nahi.  Chirag’s 102.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Unke aane ke baad toh tumhe meri yaad hee nahi aayi. Ek phone tak nahi kiya.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tum bhi toh kar sakte the.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Hmmm... kar toh sakta tha. Khair... kaise lagey Vidrohi ji?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Pehle baar mili na toh man kiya muh noch lun.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (gentle smile) Maine toh pehle hee kaha tha.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Lekin jab ghar aaye na toh laga ki itne bure bhi nahi hain. smile disappears.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur mummy papa to flat ho gaye.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Toh phir, aage ka kya socha hai?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Sochna kya hai, do hee baar toh mili hoon. Abhi toh baatein hongi, mulakaatein hongi, chandni raatein hongi. (Laughs teasingly)

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Mujhse toh tum bahut baar mili ho, mere baare mein kya jaanti ho?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Yahi ki tum mere bahut achche friend ho.  103. Just then they see Munna and Vidrohi arrive on a bike. Bitti turns to Chirag again.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jitna tumne kiya hai na mere liye utna kaun karta hai aajkal. Chirag smiles emotionally. Munna and Vidrohi are walking and talking under their breath.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Yaad rakh Vidrohi, aaj chapter close karna hai.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ratta maar ke aaye hain bhaiya. Tension mat leejiye. Munna and Vidrohi walk up to them. Vidrohi greets Bitti and Chirag in style and then looks around.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jaldi aa gaye.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aadha ghanta late hain Vidrohi ji.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Chirag babu, ye location raat ko sharaab peene ki hai. Shaam ko moongphali khaane mein kya maja hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Jitni sharab aap peete hain, moongphali ki jagah kahaan bachti hogi pait mein. Bitti is watching their conversation.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aap bilkul correct keh rahe hai Chirag babu. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Har raat peene ke baad main khud ko yahi samjhaata hoon, lekin agle din phir bhool jaata hoon. Bitti giggles. Chirag looks worried. Munna jumps in.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Bhoolne ki beemari bhi hai inko (reminds Vidrohi) hain na! Vidrohi turns towards Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre haan, ek baat batana hi bhool gaya. Main ek baar jail bhi gaya hun. Munna and Chirag are happy to hear this.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Hey Bhagwaan, jail... criminal... ye toh bohot badi baat hai.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Arre koi badi baat nahi hai. Krishna Ji to paida hi jail mein huye thhe. Aur waise bhi har baat yaad rakhni bhi nahi chahiye.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Kal agar aapko bhool gaye toh? Chirag is looking at Bitti who is looking at Vidrohi. Then to his surprise Bitti smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Itna aasaan nahi hai Bitti Mishra ko bhool paana. Laga lo sau sau ki. Aur kal tak toh bilkul nahi bhool paayenge.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (worried) Kal kya hai?  105.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Bhool gaye? Hamaari Lovely Sweets ka golden jubilee celebration hai (turns to Vidrohi) Aur aap na aayein aisa ho hee nahi sakta.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Nahi aa paayenge. Bitti and Vidrohi both ask.

dialogues.speaker: BOTH
dialogues.text: Kyon nahi aa paayenge? Chirag turns to Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aaj raat ye waapas ja rahe hain na. Chirag takes out a ticket and gives it to Vidrohi. Vidrohi looks at the ticket.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Haan waapas ja rahe hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Toh phir kaise aayenge?

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (rapid fire) Haan kaise aayenge. Kyonki ye toh ja rahe hain. Aane ka sawaal hee paida nahi hota. Phir ye toh aane se rahe. Bitti snatches the ticket from Vidrohi’s hand.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Agar ye ticket phat gaya toh?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Phaadiyega mat... nahi toh hum aapse kabhi baat nahi karenge. Vidrohi turns towards Chirag and Munna.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hai na?  106.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Haan.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Haan. Bitti gives the ticket back to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Theek hai... jaaiye. Chirag and Munna smile.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lekin jaane se pehle mera number delete kar deejiyega kyonki main hundred percent kar doongi. Bitti looks away. Chirag and Munna give each other a quiet low five. They look back and see that Vidrohi is looking emotionally at Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji... nikla jaaye phir ab, hain? Bag bhi uthaana hai, dahi bhi khaana hai.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Dekhiye dukhi mat hoiye Bitti ji. Bitti doesn’t say anything. Chirag looks at Vidrohi getting emotional and looks worried.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji, emotional hone ka waqt nahi hai ye. Vidrohi’s hand starts trembling, holding the ticket.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Badi mushkil se Vishnoi ji ko bol ke saansad kote mein confirm karwaaye hain. Vidrohi’s hand shivers more. He holds the ticket with other hand too, in a tearing position.  172 107.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (SCREAMING) Trainein pack chal rahi hain, rush ka season haiiii.... High speed shot - Vidrohi tears the ticket. Chirag and Munna are stunned. Vidrohi tosses the torn pieces in air which go flying in front of Chirag and Munna’s faces.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aapka dil dukha ke toh nahi jaayenge. Bitti smiles. Chirag shakes his head in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. VIDROHI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 172 Vidrohi’s head in inside water tank. He is gasping for breath. Chirag pulls his head out of water tank. Munna is holding Vidrohi’s hands.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (angry) Bitti ka dil dukha ke nahi jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre bhaiya baat toh suno... Chirag puts his head again in the water tank.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ticket phaad diye. Chirag pulls Vidrohi out of water tank.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hum mar mara gaye toh chaudah saal wait nahi karegi bhabhi. Chirag puts his head inside water tank again. Vidrohi gasps for breath again.  173 108. Chirag pulls Vidrohi out again.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Bhaiyaa maar hee do isko...

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre hume Rama achchi lagti hai. Chirag, about to put Vidrohi back in water tank again, stops.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. VIDROHI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 173 Chirag is sitting on a cot opposite Vidrohi who is sitting on a stool. Munna is drying Vidrohi’s head with a towel.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kya bol rahe the tum?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hume Rama achchi lagti hai. Hum Rama ke liye ticket phaade the. Arre Bitti bhabhi toh... bhabhi hai na.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Rama ko tum achche lagte ho?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Arre wahi jaanne ke liye toh ticket phaade the ki hafte bhar ruk ke uska dil tatol ke dekhte hain. Agar hamaare naam ka moti mila toh hum bhi aapke saath ghodi chhadh jaayenge. Munna bends down and goes near Vidrohi’s left ear.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Sorry. Vidrohi hits his head with his left hand as if trying to take water out of his left ear and points to his right ear with his right hand.  109.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Idhar aake boliye. Is waale mein paani bhara hai. Munna bends to his right ear.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Huh!

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab tum dil laga ke Rama mein dil lagaao. Hum hain na support karne ke liye. Chirag takes out a 500 rupee note and gives it to Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur suno, achcha sa gift khareed lena uske liye. Just then Vidrohi’s mother enters the house. She sees Vidrohi wet.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre kitni baar kahe hain ki raat ko mat nahaaya karo.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aur dekhiye na aunty kapde pehan ke naha liya. Vidrohi gives a dirty look to Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: SONG 3 STARTS
dialogues.text: The signboard now reads Lovely Sweets instead of Lovla Sweets. Only ‘ee ki maatra’ on Lovely looks brand new. Golden Jubilee celebrations. People are present there.  175 110. Vidrohi arrives, carrying a gift with Chirag, Chirag points at Rama, but Bitti’s father comes and takes the gift from Vidrohi and hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Iski kya jaroorat thi. Chirag exchanges with Vidrohi a helpless look. Bitti’s father cuts a big boondi ka laddoo and everyone claps. Bitti feeds laddoo to Vidrohi. Chirag makes a face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag instigates Vidrohi to go for Rama. Series of sequences where Vidrohi is trying to impress Rama but Bitti is also getting impressed. Chirag is trying to make his presence felt. He tries to dance with Bitti but Bitti dances more with Vidrohi. Bitti’s parents are also noticing Vidrohi closely.

dialogues.speaker: SONG 3 ENDS
dialogues.text: INT. FATHER’S BEDROOM - NIGHT 175 Father is staring at the ceiling. Mother is fast asleep.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (mumbling) Chalo pukhraj pehanne ka kuch toh faayda hua. Bitti ke liye ek ladka dhoond rahe the, mil gaye do. Ab chooj kar lo. Hai ki nahi. Aur aisa bhi nahi hai ki rasgulle aur bataashe mein se chooj karna hai. Ek rasgulla hai toh doosra gulaab jaamun. Aur dono mein ras labalab bhara hai. Ab kaun sa chooj karein ye sochna thoda mushkil hai. Par mushkilein kiski jinadgi mein nahi hoti. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: FATHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Raam lala ko hee dekh lo, kittni mushkilein jheli. Aur woh toh bhagwan the, hum thehre insaan, hai ki nahi.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. CHIRAG’S COURTYARD - MORNING 176 Chirag is heading out. Mother calls out to him.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kahaan ja rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Mandir. As Chirag walks out, mother keeps on instructing from behind.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Suno, do tho nariyal le aana. Aur pooja ke mat laana, chatni banaani hai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag is entering the school on a bike. He parks the bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitti’s mother is sitting in the staff room. She is trying to solve ‘Crossword’ on a newspaper. She is looking at the paper with difficulty, keeping it close to her eyes. Chirag enters the staff room.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Namaste aunty.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Khush raho beta. Achcha ye bataao... chanchalta se bharpoor, daayein se baayein, teen akshar ka.  112.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Chapal.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (happy) Haan. As she fills the crossword Chirag takes out specs and keeps it in front of her. She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aapka toot gaya tha na. Humne kaswa diya hai. Mother runs her hand over Chirag’s head.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Tum sabke liye kitna sochte ho na beta. Chirag smiles.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hum bhi soch rahe hain beta ek baat kai din se.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kya?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Bitti ki shaadi ke baare mein.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre aap chinta mat keejiye aunty, achchi ladki hai Bitti, ho jaayegi. Mother holds Chirag’s one hand with her both hands.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Sach kahein beta, ladka toh najar ke saamne hee hai. Chirag adjusts his collar with his other hand.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hum Bitti ko mana lenge beta. Bas tum...

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (eager) Haan aunty...  179 113.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: -.. Vidrohi ji ko mana lo. Chirag takes his hands back and looks worried.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aunty, Bitti aur Vidrohi ji? Aapko Bitti ne kaha?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre kisi ke kehne ki jaroorat hai kya? Saath mein dekhe ho dono ko. Ekdum raam seeta ki jodi hain. Chirag is scandalized.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ab bas beta tum hanuman ji bann ke hamaare kaleje se pahaad utha lo. Chirag gulps down his saliva. Mother is looking at her.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya hua beta? Chirag pretends to be struggling to come up with an answer and then finally breaks the suspense.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab kya bataayein aunty. Vidrohi ji ka toh talaak ho chuka hai. Mother looks stunned. School bell ringing in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag and Munna are standing. Vidrohi comes rushing and panting.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aisa kya ho gaya bhaiya jo itna urgent mein bula liye.  114.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Jo hua woh tumhaare liye achcha nahi hua.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ab hamaare saath kya ho gaya bhaiya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tum Rama ke dil mein pyaar ka jo moti dhoondh rahe ho na, woh kal ek kawwa chug gaya.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hum samjhe nahi bhaiya.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Abbe Rama ko dekhne kal ladke waale aaye the. Aur unko Rama pasand bhi aa gayi. Vidrohi looks worried.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aur Rama ne haan bol diya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Na bhi nahi bola.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (angrily) Ladka kaun hai bhaiya, bas naam bataaiye aap.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kuch nahi ukhaad paaoge beta tum. Sunaar hai. Sarafe mein dukaan hai. Khaali chaandi chaandi bhi pighlaaye na toh poori Bareilly ke jevar ban jaayein.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Abbe unke yahaan jo shutter uthaata hai na woh bhi tumse jyaada kamaata hai. Vidrohi takes a deep breath and looks down.  115.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (slyly) Lekin... hum Rama ki aankhon mein tumhaare liye pyaar dekhe hain.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (quickly) Haan, haan, hum bhi dekhe hain. Vidrohi looks up.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Toh ab hum kya karein bhaiya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Hum toh kehte hain kal hee jaake bol do. Vidrohi is thinking.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Arre kawwa moti le jaayega.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bol dete hain bhaiya.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aur sabke saamne bolna.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Sabke saamne kyon?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abbe akele mein toh chumma chaati hoti hain, pyaar ka ijhaar sabke saamne hee hota hai. Chhati thok ke. Vidrohi nods.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Jaao, propose karne ke liye kuch achcha 1likh lo. Vidrohi nods and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Rama haan bolegi?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Apne ko kya?  180 116. Munna looks at Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Abbe padosi ke ladke ko aam ke ped pe chhadhaaye hain. Neeche utra toh aam khaane ko milenge, gir ke mar gaya toh terahvi ka khaane ko milega. Munna chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ab Rama haan bole ya na, dono haal mein Bitti ka dil tootna hee tootna hai.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (chuckling) Bhaiya aap na bahut neech hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Jaante hain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wide shot of boat on a lake. Chirag, Munna, Vidrohi, Bitti and Rama are sitting on a boat. The boat is gently rocking. Rama and Bitti are busy dipping their hands in the water. The guide is narrating a story.

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE
dialogues.text: iss jheel mein jannmi ye prem kahani hai...film ka naam jawaani deewaani hai. Vinod Khanna aur dharmendra ke beech hua tha ghamaasaan...wajah thi Hema Malini shreeman...Dream girl. Guide continues speaking in the background. Chirag elbows Vidrohi to start the conversation.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (MUMBLES)
dialogues.text: Abe bol na.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (MUMBLES)
dialogues.text: Ye chup ho toh bolun na.  117. Guide continues to speak.

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE
dialogues.text: Mundi ghumaiye udhar aur dekhiye adbhut manzar... Chirag cuts him in between.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: O bhaisaab...

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE
dialogues.text: Ji Bhaisaab...

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Moo band karenge?

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE
dialogues.text: Kyun bhaisaab? Chirag just gives him a look angrily. The Guide gets the message.

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ji bhaisaab.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Arre kyun mana kar diya... kitna mazaa toh aa raha tha... Bitti holds Chirag’s face and turns it to the scenery.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (Imitates the guide) Mundi ghumaiye udhar, aur dekhiye adbhut manzar. Chirag then holds Bitti’s face and turns it towards Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Woh... Vidrohi ji kuch kehna chahte hain.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kya? Vidrohi takes a deep breath and closes his eyes.  118.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Tere dil ne mere dil ko daboch liya hai, mere seene se chain-o- karaar noch liya hai, tere bina zindagi hai empty empty rama, tujhe wife banaana hai, bas soch liya hai. Will you marry me? As Vidrohi finishes the proposal, there is an awkward silence. Vidrohi keeps looking at Rama, Chirag looks at Bitti. Bitti’s face drops and she turns her face away. Rama looks uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji I’m sorry. Aap bohot achhe hain, main pasand bhi karti hun aapko. Lekin main ek talaakshuda aadmi se shaadi nahi kar sakti. Vidrohi is taken aback, he looks at Munna and Chirag who act clueless.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Talaak? Mera? Arre meri toh aaj tak sagai bhi nahi hui. Bata na Chirag inko.

dialogues.speaker: RAMA
dialogues.text: Chirag ne hi bataya hai. Vidrohi looks at Chirag in disbelief, Chirag acts clueless.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Kya? Near the lotus pond.

dialogues.speaker: GUIDE
dialogues.text: (in his tone) Aur ye raha suicide point, yahaan har saal bahattar aashiq jal samaadhi lete hain. Vidrohi is stunned. Rama is looking away. Chirag looks at Bitti who is upset. Chirag smiles lightly.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 181 119. INT. CHIRAG’S ROOM —- DAY 181 Chirag and Munna are quietly sitting as Vidrohi fumes in anger.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aapke paapon ka ghada bhar chuka hai Chirag bhaiya, aur ab hum woh ghada aapke hi sar pe phodenge. Jitna raita phailaaye hain na sab aap hi sameetenge. Looks angrily towards Munna.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur tum saale boondi batoroge.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Ai tu aukaat mein reh.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ai... aukaat mein tu reh warna sach mein laat maar ke koolha barbaad kar denge. Munna tries to say something but words don’t come out of his mouth. He keeps shut.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arre mazaak bana diya hamaari zindagi ko. Itni mushkil se do pahiye jod ke cycle kase thhe... aap ek jhatke mein chain hi utaar diye. Talaak kara diye hamaara.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre Bitti ki amma tumhe daamad banaane pe tuli hai. Kya karte hum bataao? Kya karte? Saala bann jaate tumhaara? Hume jo theek laga humne kar diya, bas.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aur hamaara jo dil toot gaya woh?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tumhe yahaan hum apna dil jodne laaye the. Humne bola tha Rama se chonch ladaane ke liye. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ek baar hamaara dil jud jaaye phir jahaan chahe moo maar lena, hame farak nahi padta.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Waah Chirag bhaiya waah. Apni daal galaane ke liye aap kisi ki bhi seeti baja sakte hain na. Ab hum aapki seeti bajaayenge.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kya kar loge be tum?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Zyada kuch nahi. Aapki naak ke neeche se Bitti uda ke le jaayenge.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abbe shakal dekhi hai apni. Ladka bhi na patega tumse.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Agar ladkiyaan shakal dekh ke shaadi karti na Chirag bhaiya toh aadha India kuwaara hota.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (lightly) Theek hai. Agar bhoole bhatke se kahin Bitti se tumhaari shaadi ho gayi toh shehnaai main bajaaoonga. Munna giggles.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Aur kursiyaan main jama doonga. Vidrohi gets up and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bhaiya ye toh aasteen ka anaconda nikla. Humee ko nigalne ki soch raha hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abbe Bitti haath mein mehandi lagaayegi, gobar nahi. Ye kuch nahi ukhaad paayega.  182 183 121. C/u on Chirag staring.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. CHIRAG’S COURTYARD - CONTINUOUS 182 Chirag and Munna are walking out.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kahan jaa rahe ho?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (IRRITATED)
dialogues.text: Jahannum.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Dahi lete aana pauna kilo... raaita banana hai.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - LATE EVENING 183 Chirag enters the house and asks the mother.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aunty Bitti oopar hai na? Mother nods and points towards the terrace. Chirag walks towards the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beta Suno... Chirag stops.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kahan ghoomti rehti hai Bitti raat biraat? Arre ladki hai chudail nahi hai. Samjhao usko tum. Chirag gets a faint smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre kuch nahi thodi pareshaan hai. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Main hoon na, samjha doonga. Aap bas chai bana do...kadak. Mother nods and goes back to doing her work.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI’S TERRACE - LATE EVENING 184 Bitti is standing quietly. Chirag comes with a smile on his face, the moment Bitti looks at him he makes the smile disappear and shows fake concern.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kaisi hai Rama ab? Meri hi galti hai yaar, us ghaamad ko lekar hi nahi aana tha yahan. Ek kitaab kya likh li khud ko Ghalib samajhne laga. Bitti just looks at him surprised. Chirag continues.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Achha hua... Rama ne mana kar diya. Na ghar ka raha na ghat ka. Chirag then tries to console Bitti.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur yaar letter likhe tumko aur propose kar diya Rama ko... tum please dukhi mat ho.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Main kyon dukhi hone lagi? Chirag is surprised.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arre talaak hua hai yaar koi murder thodi na kiya hai Vidrohi ji ne. Ho sakta hai koi chudail palley pad gayi ho. Rama itni bewakoof hogi ye nahi socha tha maine. Chirag can’t believe what he is hearing.  185 123.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tum Rama ki jagah Vidrohi ki side le rahi ho?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Toh kya karein? Tumhaare aur Rama ki tarah hum bhi un pe joote barsaane lagein? Bina poori baat jaane? Arre bahut log humko galat samajhte hain, toh hum galat ho gaye kya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (straight faced) Bitti meri najar mein tum bilkul galat nahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Haan, toh meri najar mein Vidrohi ji galat nahi hain. Chirag looks dumbfound. Cut to him walking down the staircase.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - NIGHT 185 Bitti’s mother is standing with a cup of tea. Chirag comes down the stairs, looking devastated.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Beta chai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (UPSET)
dialogues.text: Aaj chai se nahi hoga aunty. Chirag leaves. Mother mumbles.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre phir banwayi kyun? Baawan rupye litre ho gaya hai doodh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag and Munna are drinking. Both are sloshed. Papers around. Sitting behind the huge boxes.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Toone ekdum correct bola tha Munna.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Haan bhaiya... Whiskey ke saath na ubla chana hi achha lagta hai... moomphalli nahi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Wo nahi... mujhe Bitti ko bata dena chahiye tha... ki bareilly ki barfi maine likhi thi aur letter bhi maine hee likhe thhe.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Bhaiya I love you toh bohot pehle bol dena tha aapko.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Abe humein kya pata tha ki sari pehnane waala topi pehna dega. Aur Bitti ko pata nahi usme kya achcha lagta hai.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Arre bhaiya Vidrohi ke saamne toh aap bahut smart lagte ho. Chirag looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Nahi, waise bhi aap bahut smart lagte ho, solo mein bhi, group mein bhi, looks nikhar ke aate hain aapke. Chirag giggles.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aur Vidrohi chala hai humse mugabla karne.  187 188 125.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Mugabla toh one sided hee hai bhaiya phir bhi safety ke liye I love you bol hee do. Woh kya hai na kabhi kabhi chhuchhoondar bhi saanp ki cassette phasa deti hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab I love you ka time nahi raha Munna, ab toh bas ye dekhna hai ki Bitti kisse pyar karti hai... Vidrohi se ya humse. Ab agar hamaara pyaar sachha hai na munna to Bitti humko hi chunegi.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Aap hee ko chahti hai bhaiya toh aap hee ko chunengi. Vidrohi ko chunne ka sawaal he paida nahi hota. Phir toh usko chunne se rahi.

dialogues.speaker: DIFFERENT TONE
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI TERRACE —- EVENING 187 Bitti is trying to cheer Vidrohi up. Vidrohi is keeping a sad face.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aaj office nai gayi tum

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji k liye chutti 1li hai When Bitti looks away Vidrohi makes a face at Chirag and then immediately goes back to making a sad face when Bitti looks back. Finally Vidrohi laughs and Bitti looks mighty pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three of them are going down the stairs.  189 190 191 126.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitti sits on her bike. Seeing who is going to sit first, Vidhrohi sits behind her. Chirag is angry. Bitti zooms. Chirag follows in his bike. Vidrohi turns back to give a dirty smile to Chirag. Chirag zooms past them.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. RESTAURANT OR EATING PLACE
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is eating with his mouth open.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aise chap chap karke nahi khaate hain. Vidrohi doesn’t even look at Chirag. He turns to Bitti instead.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Rabdi khaane ka maza toh chap chap kar ke hee hai. Poora swaad ghul jaata hai moo mein. Bitti also eats with her mouth open and quite enjoys it. Chirag is dumbfound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is farsaan on the plate. Chirag gives her a sari eating a little farsaan. Bitti rolls it around her, wears it clumsily.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: (laughing) vaarshik mahoutsav pe Mummy ne pehnai ti Vidrohi helps her wear it by wrapping it around it. As Vidrohi does so Chirag fumes. Chirag tries various things but Vidrohi is one step ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag goes to Bitti’s house. Vidrohi is already there winning over her parents. He is cracking father’s knuckles. Father is enjoying it.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. BITTI TERRACE —- EVENING 193 Chirag is holding the firki. Bitti is holding the kite for vidhrohi to fly the kite.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Mujhe English picturein badi pasand hain.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (to Vidrohi) English aati hai aapko?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ek baar aayi thi. Pasand nahi aayi, waapas bhej diya. Bitti bursts out laughing while vidhrohi flies the kite away. Bitti looks at the sky with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wide shot of early morning bareilly city EXT. BOOK STALL —- EARLY EVENING 1940 Bitti chirag and Vidhrohi are at a book store. Bitti is browsing books. chirag is on the other side browsing.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Aapko fark padta hai ki main virgin hoon ya nahi?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Virgin ka matlab hee nahi pata toh kya fark padta hai. (laughs ) Bitti smiles as she looks at Chirag who is on the other side.  195 196 197 198 199 128.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitti is teaching Vidrohi how to do break dance. Vidrohi takes off his jacket and makes Chirag hold it. He tries to dance but dances funnily. Bitti finds it amusing. Bitti takes a selfie of all three of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag later check her facebook profile. Same selfie is there but Chirag is half cut out from it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vidrohi and Bitti are making laddoos in Mithai shop. Father is watching, looking impressed. Chirag and Munna are calling Vidrohi’s boss. Boss looks angry. Later Chirag and Munna are watching Vidrohi talk to his boss.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Abbe tum kya nikaaloge, hum nikaalte hain khud ko tumhaari naukri se. Aur suno, hamaara jitna baaki hai uski mithaai kha lena (looks at Chirag and Munna) shaadi kar rahe hain. Chirag and Munna look away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitti is on the bike with Vidhrohi passing chirag who is a little late to arrive. She smiles as they pass and vidhorhi gives a yes look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night time. Father opens the door. Bitti walks in with a smile on her face. Father looks out. He sees Vidrohi walking away.  200 129.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Father, mother and Bitti are sitting around a fire and look in deep thought. Bitti breaks silence after a moment.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Jab single the toh problem thi, aur ab married hone ki soch rahe hain toh bhi problem hai?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arre nahi beta problem kuch nahi hai. Kabhi toka hai tumko aaj tak? Aaj bhi tok nahi rahe hain... bas beta jo kar rahi ho soch samajh ke karna.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre soch samajh ke kya? Shaadi kar rahi hai. Ladke se!!! Hum toh isi mein khush hain.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tum toh khush hogi hee. Bala jo tali.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Khushi ki baat hee hai...

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: (cuts her) Jab beti ghar mein rehti hai toh lagta hai ki kab doosre ghar jaayegi. Aur jab jaane ko hoti hai toh lagta hai ki uske bina kaise reh paayenge. Bitti smiles emotionally at her father.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Ab papa aap ro-ogey toh main nahi jaaoongi.  201 130.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: (immediately) Arre inki baat pe dhyaan mat de beta, inhe toh chikoti kaat do toh bhi rona aa jaata hai(mutter under breath to father) aap bhi na... (to Bitti) chalo main chai laati hoon, haan. Mother gets up and leaves. Bitti and father have tears.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Cigarette hai? Father smiles at her with tears in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag and Bitti are sitting and talking. Chirag is upset.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aisa kya hai yaar Vidrohi mein ki tum apni saari zindagi uske saath bitana chahti ho? Ek kitaab hi toh likhi hai usne.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Yaar pehle mujhe farg padta tha, par ab iss baat se koi farq nahi padta ki unhone kitaab likhi hai ya nahi, letter likhe hain ya nahi. Ab sirf ye maaine rakhta hai ki Vidrohi ji aadmi bure nahi hain, mujhe pyaar karte hain aur main unke saath khush rahoongi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Yaar tum jaisi ho, tumhe pyaar karne waale, khush rakhne waale bohot milenge, toh kya tum kisi se bhi shaadi kar logi?  202

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kin logon ki baat kar rahe ho Chirag? Teen baar reject ho chuki hun main, kaun baitha hai mere saath shaadi karne ke liye? Tum bhi toh jaante ho na mujhe itne time se. Tumhe toh nahi hua mujhse pyaar. Arre kamiyaan hain mujhmein Chirag, mujhe pata hai. Lekin in sab kamiyon ke bawajood bhi agar Vidrohi ji ko main pasand hun toh ismein problem kya hai.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Mujhe lagta hai ki tum jaldbaazi kar rahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kaisi jaldbaazi Chirag? atahees saal ki ho gayi hun, ab aur bojh nahi banna chahti main apne Maa Baap pe. Aur main koi compromise nahi kar rahi hun. Chirag doesn’t know what to say.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT,_CHTRAG’ S HOUSE — NIGHT 202 idyehi oli } . INT. CHIRAG’S WRITING ROOM - NIGHT 202A Chirag is livid. Munna is quietly watching him.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (livid) Padna hee nahi chahiye tha iss lafde mein. Karna hee nahi chahiye tha pyaar.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Ek baar bol dete...

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (cuts him) Kya ho jaata I love you bolne se Munna? Hmmm? (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aankhon mein nahi dikhta kya usko pyaar? Arre kitna kuch kiya yaar uske liye. Din raat aage peechhe ghhoomta raha, jo usne chaha woh kiya. Lucknow tak gaya uss kutte ko laane. Aur kaise karte hain pyaar? Munna looks sad too.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dukh iss baat ka nahi hai munna ki hum bol nahi paaye. Dukh iss baat ka hai ki wohh hamaara pyaar dekh hee nahi paayi. Chirag turns and sees Vidrohi is standing there at the door. He has a smirk on his face.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bole the na Chirag babu, Bitti ko aapki naak ke neeche se uda ke le jaayenge. Chirag looks at him angrily. Vidrohi hands Chirag a shehnaai.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Practice shuru kar deejiye. Tip achchi milegi. Chirag charges angrily and holds Vidrohi’s collar.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Collar chhodo Chirag babu, hamaara haath chhoot gaya na, toh na izzat rahegi na akad. Munna charges towards Vidrohi.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Abbe saale...

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aye... beech mein na aana, ek khoon likh hai hamaare haath mein. Munna stops.  133. Vidrohi holds Chirag’s hands firmly and releases his collar.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tujhe pata tha na ki main Bitti se pyaar karta hun, Bhabhi bolta tha na usko. Phir ye sab kyon kiya?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bitti pyaar karti hai tumko? Chirag keeps quiet.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hum pyaar karte thhe Rama ko, wo nahi karti thi, toh kya ab rote rahein poori zindagi. Haqeegat ye hai Chirag babu ki Bitti humko pyaar karti hai... Chirag keeps quiet.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sab toh kar ke dekh liya tumne, mujhe yahan bula ke, bandar ki tarah nacha ke, bura bana ke... lekin kya fayda hua? Dil ke bure nahi ho tum, lekin ab kahin aur dil lagao, kyunki agar ab mere aur Bitti ke beech mein koi aaya... toh achha nahi hoga. Sagaai mein aaiyega jaroor.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ye jo akad dikha raha hai na tu, ye maine hee dee hai tujhe. Jab sach baahar aayega na toh sabse pehle Bitti tujhe baahar nikaalegi. Vidrohi is unruffled.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Toh kya karoge? Bitti ko sab sach bata doge? Chirag smiles wickedly.  134.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab jab dil tootna hee hai, toh sabka toote. Mera akele ka kyon toote. Munna nods in vengeance.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: All the best. Vidrohi leaves. Chirag watches him leave. He is livid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag is riding his bike purposefully.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 204 EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - DAY 204 Chirag enters the house, everyone is busy doing something. Father is inspecting the fairy lights. A helper is looking at him.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Arre chalu kar na beta.

dialogues.speaker: HELPER
dialogues.text: Chalu hai uncle.

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Ye toh dikhai nahi rahi.

dialogues.speaker: HELPER
dialogues.text: Arre dim light hai uncle raat mein dikhegi. Chirag looks at mother who is busy showing the jewellery to Aunty.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aunty Bitti?  205 135.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Room mein hai beta.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. BITTI’S ROOM - DAY 205 Chirag walks towards the room, rama passes by chirag. the room door is latched, he calls out for Bitti and enters the room. Bitti is doing a costume trial for the engagement. Chirag is spellbound as he sees Bitti in a beautiful outfit. He keeps on looking at her. Bitti turns.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (EXCITED)
dialogues.text: Kaisi lag rahi hun?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Achhi lag rahi ho. Bitti turns back to check herself in the mirror. Chirag is seen mustering up courage. Bitti turns and finds Chirag upset.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Tujhe kya ho gaya?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Mujhe kya hoga?

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Toh khush nahi lag raha?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tum bahut khush lag rahi ho.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Main bahut khush hoon. Chirag keeps on looking Bitti and then lets out a faint smile and nods. Both keep looking at each other for a while.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kuch kaam tha mujhse? Chirag shakes his head gently to indicate no. Bitti’s mother calls out for Chirag.  136.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Chirag Beta...

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Haan aunty.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yahan aana ek minute. Chirag leaves Bitti and goes to the mother.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: 206 EXT. BITTI’S COURTYARD - CONTINUOUS 206 Bitti’s mother shows Chirag an engagement ring.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Kaisi hai?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bohot achhi hai aunty.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: La haath la idhar. Chirag hesitates but Mother holds his hand and forces the ring on.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Arre dekhun toh sahi... Vidrohi ke haath pe kaisi lagegi... Kya badhiya lag rahi hai, nahi... dekh Rama. Chirag looks embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lao beta dibbi mein rakh dein. Chirag tries to take the ring off. Meanwhile mother turns to father.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bitti ke Papa, angoothi toh badi badhiya ho gayi bhai. Mother finds Chirag struggling with the ring.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kya hua beta?  207 208 137.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Angoothi phas gayi hai aunty.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Arre, kaise? Lao hum dekhein. Mother tries to remove the ring but fails. Father and Rama join in but they fail too. Bitti hears the commotion and comes out. She tries to take the ring out. Chirag quietly watches. People talking in b/g.

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN 1
dialogues.text: Ghee le aao, phataphat nikal jaayegi.

dialogues.speaker: MAN 1
dialogues.text: Arre saabun se badhiya rehta hai. Bitti takes Chirag to the wash basin and applies soap on his finger.

dialogues.speaker: SONG 4 SAD SONG BEGINS
dialogues.text: Chirag is only looking at Bitti who is engrossed in taking the ring out. High speed - Slowly the ring slips out of Chirag’s finger and he watches it go away from him. Everyone is joyous as the ring finally comes out. Chirag quietly leaves the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag on the bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag sitting on the cot and hogging. As he eats he cries.
EXT. CHIRAG TERRACE —- NIGHT 209 Wide shot of chirag sitting in the corner and just looking up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag going through his writing and Bitti’s photograph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ends inside the room where chirag bends down on his desk.

dialogues.speaker: SONG 4 SAD SONG ENDS
dialogues.text: INT. CHIRAG’S HOUSE - DAY 212 Chirag looks into the mirror, sad, changes his shirt EXT. PRINTING PRESS —- DAY 212A Chirag enters the printing press, opens the shutter and checks bitti’s picture on facebook. Munna enters the press. Does not see Chirag on his desk. Finds him sitting behind some printer in the corner. Munna comes and sits beside him. After a drop of silence.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Kya boli Bhabhi?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Himmat nahi hui yaar usko bataane ki.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Yaar woh Vidrohi ke saath bahut khush hai. Kaise todta uska dil. Chirag looks at Munna, teary eyed.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Main bahut swarthi tha munna. Hamesha apni khushi ke baare mein sochta tha. Chalo pyaar ne doosre ki khushi mein bhi khush hona sikha diya. Vidrohi bhi kharaab aadmi nahi hai. Munna gets emotional.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: Aap neech nahi ho bhaiya. Munna looks at Chirag emotionally. Chirag walks away from his own press. Sit on the bike leaves. Munaa looks at him sad leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag is sitting and drinking at the dining table. Mother looking through the hole in the wall worried. Chirag is writing something on the dining table, remembering the times spent with Bitti, looking at her photograph (similar to Babli shot) Cut to Chirag’s asking mother.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bahar jaa raha hun, kuch laana hai kya?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER, (WORRIED)
dialogues.text: Nahi beta, bas jaldi wapas aa jaana. C/u on mother looking worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is watching cricket on the flat screen TV is surprised to see Chirag. Vidrohi talks normally.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kaisa hai tu?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Theek hun bhaiya.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Sorry yaar, galti meri thi. Bohot pareshaan kiya na maine tujhe.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Hota hai bhaiya... Chirag hands Vidrohi the paper.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ye le...

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ye kya hai?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bitti ke liye kuch likha hai... teri taraf se, kyonki tu bahut kharab likhta hai. Sagai mein padh dena, usey achha lagega. Vidrohi reads the paper and hugs Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aap aaiyega bhaiya. Aapke bina Mazaa nahi aayega. Chirag just smiles.

dialogues.speaker: 214A INT.CHIRAG HOUSE
dialogues.text: Chirag sleeps peacefully looking in oblivion

dialogues.speaker: SONG 4 SAD SONG PART CONTINUES
dialogues.text: Cut to.  215 141. INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - NIGHT 215 Rose, arranging chair. Few relatives have also come for the function. Bitti’s father pats Chirag’s back and introduces him to the relatives. Munna is arranging the chairs. Everyone looks elated. Vidrohi walks in with his mother. Bitti’s parents welcome Vidrohi’s mother. Vidrohi looks a little uncomfortable as he walks towards Chirag who is with his mother.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (Sore throat) Bhaiya, problem ho gayi.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Teri aawaaz ko kya hua?

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Wahi toh problem ho gayi na. Amma ne phate doodh ki chai pila di.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Ab? Vidrohi points towards the letter.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Ye aap padh deejiye na, hamaari taraf se.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Nahi yaar, mujhse nahi hoga.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Aap hi padhenge. Vidrohi makes an announcement before Chirag can say anything.  142.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (Sore throat) Bhaiyon... aur ek ko chhod ke behno, mataaon aur sajjano. Is lamhe ko yaadgaar banane ke liye, maine Bitti ke liye kuch likha hai... lekin is baithi awaaz mein sunaoonga to aap sab ka dil baith jaayega (People chuckle) Aur isliye mera jigri dost Chirag padh ke sunaayega. Chirag is hesitant but people clap and Chirag has to take the center stage. He starts reading the letter. Everyone listens.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Bareilly ki Barfi, Bitti. Tum soch rahi hogi ki main already itna kuch 1likh chuka hoon tumhaare baare mein ki ab aur kya baaki reh gaya hai. Par tum nahi jaanti ki tumhaare baare mein kehne ke liye mere paas itna kuch hai ki shayad poori Zindagi kam pad jaaye. Bitti looks emotional. Chirag looks up from the letter and looks emotional too. Everyone else is quietly watching.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kisi ke liye tum gussail ho toh kisi ke liye bigdail, kisi ko tumhari baatein atpati lagti hain, toh kisi ko kuch zyada hee chatpati. Par mujhe tumhari har baat achchi lagti hai. Just then the power goes off and the entire place looks dark. A murmur travels in the air.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Poore shahar ki gayi hai. Thodi der mein aa jaayegi. Asuvidha ke liye khed hai. A chuckle travels in the air. Lamps are lit. Bitti’s eyes are moist. Chirag continues to speak in the dim light, without reading now.  143.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Badi ajeeb si ho tum. Hasti ho toh chaar daant zyada dikhte hain, roti ho toh naak behne lagti hai. Kabhi bina baat ke bahut khush ho jaati ho toh kabhi baat baat pe bidak jaati ho. Everyone is looking a bit surprised that Chirag is speaking without reading. Bitti is smiling emotionally.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aasan nahi hai tumse pyaar karna, par tumhe pyaar na karna, uss se bhi zyada mushkil hai. Chirag is getting emotional now. Bitti has tears in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sau sau ki shart laga lo, mujh se zyada pyaar tumhe aur koi nahi kar paayega. Aur jo haar gaya na toh hazaar le lena. Bitti is crying now. Chirag has tears in his eyes. Everyone else has tears in their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Shaadi karogi mujhse? Bitti gets up from her place with tears in her eyes. She goes to Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Haan. Chirag is surprised, he points towards Vidrohi. Bitti gestures ‘no’ and points back towards Chirag. Chirag is awestruck.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aur kab tak chhupaane ka irada tha Chirag? Bareilly ki barfi kisne likhi hai main jaanti hun, woh letters kisne likhe hain woh bhi jaanti hun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chirag is speechless. Power comes back on.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tumhe kaise pata chala? Bitti gives him a mysterious smile. Chirag looks at Vidrohi. Vidrohi looks scared in a playful manner.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: (normal voice) Bhaiya main toh...(Sour throat) gala kharaab hai kaise bolta? Vidrohi smiles sheepishly. Chirag looks at Munna.

dialogues.speaker: MUNNA
dialogues.text: (scared) Bhaiya hum Laxman hain Vibheeshan nahi. Hume kuch nahi pata. Rama breaks into giggle. Everyone breaks into laughter. Chirag comes to terms with the situation. He looks at Bitti’s parents in surprise.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Aap log bhi mile huye thhe?

dialogues.speaker: FATHER
dialogues.text: Beta humko toh do-ek din pehle hee bataaya isne.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Phir toh hum taiyaari mein lag gaye the. Chirag smiles.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Kab se chal raha tha ye naatak, aur bataya kisne? Bitti looks at Vidrohi who looks away sheepishly.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji senti ho gaye thhe, maine sambhaalne ke liye haath pakda to sab ugal diye.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. MARKET PLACE
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is emotional.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Bareily ki barfi ka writer Chirag hai. Hame phasaya hai in dono ne. Vidrohi is teary eyed. Bitti is surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bitti is telling Rama.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Vidrohi ji waise nahi hain jaisa hum soch rahe hain. Cut to present. INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - NIGHT 218

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Tumhe pata tha toh tumne kuch kaha kyon nahi? Bitti takes a pause and then speaks.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kyonki mujhe ye nahi pata tha ki tum mujhse sach mein pyaar karte ho ya sirf isliye ki tumhe mujh mein Babli dikhti hai. Chirag looks emotional.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Isliye ye sab drama karna pada. Main darr darr ke tumhaara test leti rahi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vidrohi tearing off the tickets. Bitti is smiling.  220 221 222 223 224 225 146. EXT. SHIKARA — DAY 220 Rama winks at Bitti as the boat turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vidrohi is challenging Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. SOME PLACE
dialogues.text: Bitti is having fun with Vidrohi. Chirag is sulking. Bitti and Vidrohi exchange a low five. Cut back to present INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - CONTINUOUS 223 Bitti is talking to Chirag.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Par tum har test mein pass ho gaye. Bitti has tears in her eyes. Chirag hugs her tight. Everyone smiles. EXT, BITTT’S LANE — NIGHT 224 222 INT. BITTI’S HOUSE - CONTINOUS 225 Bitti’s mother gives her the ring. Bitti puts the ring on Chirag’s finger. To Chirag’s surprise it fits perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: Arre ye to chhoti thi.

dialogues.speaker: BITTI
dialogues.text: Kal naap liya tha na. Chirag smiles.  147. Vidrohi hands him the other ring. Chirag hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: VIDROHI
dialogues.text: Theek kiye na bhaiya hum?

dialogues.speaker: CHIRAG
dialogues.text: (emotionally) Baaja phaad diye bey tum toh. Vidrohi smiles. Chirag puts the ring on Bitti’s finger. Rama stands beside Vidhrohi as she holds his hands hands and looks at him coyly.
